full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 56 of 236 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross 960 your Honor has also reviewed page 835 -- THE COURT: Yes, I have the testimony in mind. Now I need to see what you're contending is inconsistent. MR. PAGLIUCA: Right. I'm at lines 10 through 12, your Honor. THE COURT: Of what page? I have page 182. MR. PAGLIUCA: It's 183, lines 9 through 12. 182 is for context. (Pause) THE COURT: Sustained. BY MR. PAGLIUCA: Q. Mr. Alessi, do you recall that the lawyer for Jane, a lawyer for Jane, contacted you in July of 2020, two thousand twenty? A. No. Q. Do you recall that in July of 2020, you authored a declaration, which is a sworn statement, under oath, declaration of Juan P. Alessi? A. I don't know. I don't know what you talking about. At 2020? Q. Yes. MR. PAGLIUCA: Can we show the witness Defendant's Exhibit JA-1, please. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I do not have a copy of this. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012570
